name: Terabox Downloader Bot
description: A Telegram bot to download files from Terabox, using Pyrogram and Aria2.

TELEGRAM_API.description: Telegram API ID from https://my.telegram.org. Example: 12345678

TELEGRAM_HASH.description: Telegram API Hash from https://my.telegram.org. Example: 0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef

DUMP_CHAT_ID.description: Your personal Telegram user ID or dump group/chat ID. Example: -1001234567890 (for group) or 123456789 (for user)

FSUB_ID.description: Channel ID to force users to join (optional). Example: -1009876543210
